Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.cg_8.model.Model

  • public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all the references to game objects: decks, players and map.

    Simone

      • removePlayer

        public void removePlayer(Player player)
        This method removes a player from a starting game

      • initGame

        public void initGame()
        Initializes the game. It populates the decks, assign a character to each player and changes the turnPhase to TURN_BEGIN

      • nextPlayer

        public void nextPlayer()
        Changes current player to next player in list. Increases roundNumber if a complete cycle has been done.
